item.title: International Welcome Desk
item.description: As part of our commitment to supporting our international student community, we are pleased to introduce our new dedicated service, the International Welcome Desk that will support international students in presence and through MS Teams.%0AAll available information at the page International Students Office - Welcome Desk.%0A

item.title: Special English Test Session Dedicated to Soon-To-Be Graduates in The Autumn Session
item.description: The SLAM Centre is running a special English test session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the autumn session. The test is being held in person at the SLAM Centre, 11, Santa Sofia street ‚Äì Milan - on the following day:%0A‚Ä¢ 09th November 2023 at 9.30 a.m.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Study visa
item.description: Non-EU students residing abroad are required to submit a pre-enrolment application on Universitaly website within 31 July 2023, under penalty of exclusion. After the validation of the pre-application, they have to apply for study visa at the diplomatic/consular Mission within 30 November 2023.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: BiblioDOC: improve your information skills!
item.description: Follow BiblioDOC, the e-learning course which will help you to better cope with the drafting of reports, papers and your final dissertation.%0AOn 1 September 2023, BiblioDOC will be transferred to myAriel platform: you have time until 11.00 pm on 31 August to complete the course on the current platform and receive your certificate and Open Badge.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
